text: Gerga () or Gergas (Γεργας), also possibly called Leukai Stelai was a town of ancient Caria. Its site is located near Ovacık in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Caria Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Aydın Province Category:Çine District
title: Gerga
